section.name: What is it?
section.p: Maven NanoWeb plugin is a utility to increse productivity. Its features:

ul.li: Start a Web container running your project directly from the sources. No previous mount or war generation. So, just change your template or your NanoWeb's action (if its a dynamic flavor) and refresh your browser.
Generates a project skeleton using NanoWeb, Hibernate, Velocity and SiteMesh for you speeding up your project configuration time. (TODO)
Create a swing small window where it will be possible to start/stop/restart the web container and see log.
